title: AlphaFold2 structures guide prospective ligand discovery | Science
content: AlphaFold2 (AF2) models have had wide impact but mixed success in retrospective ligand recognition. We prospectively docked large libraries against unrefined AF2 models of the Ïƒ2 and serotonin 2A (5-HT2A) receptors, testing hundreds of new molecules and ...
